name: Not The Hexagons!
description:
You are in a world full of hexagons, but they attack you!

Will you fight back against these shapes and maybe even conquer their masters?

This game has an arcade-like structure with different enemies to destroy and 5 unique, partly bullet-hell boss fights! Master using your valuable dodge-roll to have a chance to survive! If you finish the game, you can even fight against harder versions of the bosses to prove that you are worthy!

This game is for Windows devices only.

Note: I finished this version of the game in February of 2020. I don't plan on developing this game any further since I have moved on from GameMaker to Godot, though I may re-make this game in Godot at some point in the future. I still thought it might be a good idea to finally upload this game to itch.io and share it with the world.
